name: Noise (itch) (Kapouett)
description:
An experiment based on this.

Basically everything is just noise, you can only see moving things.

Only one color layer is visible at a time, you can control which one you see to reveal certain things.

Controls:

  • Keyboard
    • Move: A/D, Q/D, arrows
    • Jump: Space, num-pad 0
    • Change color layer: Tab, E
  • Controller
    • Move: Left stick
    • Jump: A
    • Change color layer: Y
